Union_City.Roselle Park School District:
The Roselle Park School District is a comprehensive community public school district that serves students in kindergarten through twelfth grade from Roselle Park, in Union County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2011-12 school year, the district's five schools had an enrollment of 1,995 students and 173.5 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 11.50:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "DE", the fifth-highest of eight groupings.
